title: Item Shop Koopa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Negotiate**: Use your coins to buy items for someone, You can buy as many as you have gold for.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of each night, You will get 5-8 coins that you will store to use with your abilities/attributes, there is no limit to how many gold you can have.
- You can purchase the Following items:
 - Mushroom: Gives 1 use Basic autovest, 4 coins.
 - Fire Flower: Target will Torch 1 random person they killed this night, 5 coins.
 - Banana Peel: Roleblock one of the Target' visitors at random, 6 coins.
 - Warp Pipe: Transport(Check 63) 2 Targets, 8 coins. (2 uses)
 - 1-up Mushroom: Gives a 1 uses Death-Immunity autovest, 10 coins. (2 uses)
 - Star: Target gets Immortal and Lynchproof defense until the start of the next night, anyone visiting will be dealt a Powerful attack, 15 coins. (1 use)
